title: Gearty Grilling: Anne Power on growing inequality and why we need food banks
itunes:author: Professor Anne Power
description: Contributor(s): Professor Anne Power | Anne Power, Professor of Social Policy, discusses growing inequality, why government should listen more to ordinary people and why we now need food banks.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Anne Power | Anne Power, Professor of Social Policy, discusses growing inequality, why government should listen more to ordinary people and why we now need food banks.
